content.label: After you reach the higher 30+ levels you start to notice the occasional visual and functional glitches ‚Äì all connected with the behaviour above and just after chasms. It‚Äôd be nice of these would get addressed. Also agree with other reviewers that visibility (given how far the game zooms out) is a problem at night. Other than that, a fun, addictive game.  I *will* reach level 40!

So yeah, I love this game! I usually play with Maya, sometimes Felipe. The animals are cute and/or stunning! I like the different weather, and day cycle! And I actually have a private hobby of taking pictures of the wildlife and scenery! The music is nice! And I love to play in zen mode! It‚Äôs so much fun to do tricks! And sometimes I screen record to watch later! (Just in case I do something really awesome!) Like wing-suiting into a ballon, and then grinding a vine before taking a dip in a pool, and jumping a chasm and wing-suiting to wall-ride and falling onto a rock, then flipping and landing it without touching ground once! Lol! Like I said before the music is nice and I sometimes, (a lot of times) hum to it! Here are some words of praise for the game.. AWESOME! AMAZING! SPECTACULAR! EXTRAORDINARY! INCREDIBLE! MAGNIFICENT! Is that enough praise to make you get the game??? I hope so! It‚Äôs my favorite game, soooooo, maybe it will be yours too! Well! Bye! Im going to go play it now! üòÇü§©üòçüòùüòÑüëçüôÉ
The lemurs in this game are very weak. Could you make them faster and maybe add some flying foe to deal with wingsuiters
My name is the title

All I want is to be able to listen to Spotify and play this at the same time. Idk why newer games are doing this thing where you can only listen to their soundtrack. Will be sure to make this a 5 star if this is changed.

title.label: Takes a long time for coins

content.label: This is a great game but it take a really long time to get coins if you had a way too buy coins this game would be awesome. I also think you should add more upgrades. Maybe side quests every now and then would be great. Last you should add skis as a option. That‚Äôs all I still think this is a GREAT GAME!!

title.label: please bring back background audio support

content.label: please üòî it was one of the best feature for the game. I could listen to soothing music or whatever and play Alto. this game is easy 5 stars with that feature. otherwise it's unplayable for me.

This is one of my favorite games in just about the world. No adds, beautiful graphics, and such a calming atmosphere that you could fall asleep while playing. Honestly, I have no complaints. If you‚Äôre considering buying this game, I would definitely recommend it. Super fun and doesn‚Äôt get old. It‚Äôs not too fulfilling, pretty good for passing the time. I got it several years ago and still play it almost daily.

I absolutely adore this game and i can play for hours on end! but i‚Äôd really appreciate it if you‚Äôd make it so that we can listen to our own music while playing. even when i mute the sound and music in-game, i cant listen to my own music from another app. kinda brings the app down a smidge. but otherwise i love the game!!

This game is neat and very well designed, here are some suggestions.

First, when lemur run down a steep slope, it runs in the air and that is very weird.

Second, when a rope bridge is connected to a wall, the character would appear on the back of the wall after he or she finished the rope bridge.

Third, I hope birds of paradise can collect super coins and magnets as well.

Fourth, it might be more realistic if magnets attract magnets as well.

Fifth, we have campfires as in Alto's adventure, but we do not have any statistics on campfires!

Sixth, I think Felipe looks like a cockroach‚Ä¶

I loved Alto‚Äôs Adventure, and to see this sequel out is even better! I enjoy it just as much as Adventure, I‚Äôve been playing it a lot, I have a high score of about 330,000. It is visually stunning, the music is great, and it‚Äôs art style is awesome.

There are many times where I died when it wasn‚Äôt even my fault, for instance I would have to wall ride up a chasm but I‚Äôm going to fast so the wall rise doesn‚Äôt go high enough and I die, or I just jump over a rock to land right in front of another rock

title.label: Fantastic game. Just a small bug

content.label:
While I absolutely adore the thought and effort and that went into the sound design of the game and I really appreciate its music, sometimes I want to play my own tunes from the music app, but it just doesn‚Äôt work. 

Oddly enough, I tried this with Alto‚Äôs Adventure and it worked flawlessly and I was able to play. Can you fix this problem for alto‚Äôs odyssey ?
i used to be able to play this for hours on end but with recent updates you cant listen to music while you play anymore. there are also quite a few visual bugs with the scarf and landscape.

Can we get an update with new stuff? New places to surf. As much money as this game cost. You lack at updating it. More rocks to rock bounce to wall run on ive been stuck on same challenge for months on end 49

title.label: Glorious but finicky with non game sound

content.label: I loved adventure and now love odyssey for both the phone and iPad but I‚Äôm very frustrated that I cannot simultaneously play the game and an audiobook or podcast.  I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling, there is no setting to specifically allow outside audio to play on my phone while playing odyssey.  Developers help!!??!?
This was my go to zen game, but the latest update stops whatever media (music/podcast) you have playing in the background

I‚Äôve played this game for a long time, across many devices, and it always provides me with a serene and beautiful escape from whatever I‚Äôm currently doing. I love the simplistic design of the landscape and the sweeping music that accompanies you on your journey down the mountain. The quests that the game provides you with always remain challenging, but doable, which keeps you from boredom. In general, I think other game developers should take notes from Alto‚Äôs Odyssey, as this is one of the higher quality games you can get on mobile by far.

I'm not sure if i'm the only one encountering this problem but before i was able to play second party music while playing the game and now it's not working anymore. also after trying to raise the volume of the sound and music within the app, there isn't any changes
This game is so beautiful and addictive it infects your dreams. An amazing follow-up to the beloved first game. Can‚Äôt say enough good things.

Games was great until recently. Now working the first 3 or 4 hills the game will freeze. It‚Äôs not playable. This problem was not resolved by restarting the app or reinstalling it. I love this game. Please fix it.

Great game buy play it you will be happy. However there hasn‚Äôt been a update in months. I don‚Äôt know if one is coming however as of iOS 14 it is buggy glitchy and almost unplayable. I hope they fix it soon. Your mileage may vary. Would give it five stars if updates come
The game performs perfectly, it‚Äôs fun, it‚Äôs beautiful, etc. Perfect mobile game.

I honestly quite like this game but the thing that makes it less enjoyable is the day night cycle. It's part of the beauty but I wish there was an option to turn it off as I literally cannot see my character when it's night time and this has caused me to crash so many times I can't even count. I don't want them to remove it but I just want to be able to toggle it. I can't just turn up my brightness because anything above lowest brightness hurts my eyes.

If you are on the fence about this game, just buy it. It is beautiful, and has played a huge role in mine and my wife‚Äôs lives. I played it for her during her pregnancy in zen mode to help her sleep. We played it against each other for higher scores in bed. We open the game, and no only is it stunning, but it brings back so many memories. One of the best phone games ever.

title.label: Amazing but issues when doing a lemur run with a wingsuit

content.label: Very good. Love the art and challenges. Very creative and love the consept. But.... When I do a lemur run and I use the wingsuit in the sky the lemur starts walking in the sky. It was okay for awhile because it didn‚Äôt affect the gameplay until when it was walking on air and then crashed me ,Air

Everytime I play this game I have a lot of fun until the wingsuit starts to activate on its own and frankly it ruins everything ab the game cuz I‚Äôll do a trick or do anything in the air and this wingsuit will just deploy outta nowhere and I don‚Äôt even hit it to work like either that‚Äôs broken or was built to incorrectly
Very relaxing and fun
A classic.
Keep up with other apps and update with new courses, events weekly. Otherwise amazing game

I‚Äôm using my dad‚Äôs account to write this. But this is a masterpiece. The artwork is pure gold, and the music brings back so many memories. I recommend this game to anyone who is feeling sad and needs to cheer up. It‚Äôs five dollars. But it‚Äôs worth every penny

-Zachary Rodriguez

I love this sequel. The wall riding and the biomes are great, and I love the soundtrack. It‚Äôs just so visually stunning and I can‚Äôt stop playing this incredible one touch game. It takes my mind of of bad things, and that means it can be my personal stress reliever. 

        There are a few things I would improve, like how the auto adjust when you have done a backflip is off a little and when you trip it looks like you are sitting a little off the ground. But still, amazing just how it is.

        It would also be cool if you could turn things on and off like how I have always wanted to have a run that is normal, but maybe no rocks or lemurs??? But hey, don‚Äôt get me wrong, elders and lemurs are one of my favorite parts of this game.

        So overall, this is a great game!

Odyssey is a nice sequel to Adventure.  The new worlds and graphics are great and some of the new gameplay features are an added bonus.  I wish new and different characters would have been created though.  They are the same as the first version.
Incredible, dazzling, beautiful, stunning, addictive.

By far this is one of my favorite mobile games, the gameplay is so smooth and somehow simple yet it is possible to do some extremely complex stuff with combos and such. It is definitely better than altos adventure, which is how i found this game in the first place, and adds so much more variety of how you play the game. 
I do have a few questions. 
1. Will there be any new updates with added features. (Levels, biomes, etc)
2. Will there be more alto games.
I will definitely play this game and altos adventure for a long time. Thank you for making this.

This game is by far one of my all time favorites. I have bought a LOT of games from the app store, but this game has lasted the longest by far. Beautiful graphics, magical items, and amazing music. All around great game!

title.label: Love it but one thing annoys me

content.label:
Like I said the game is by far my favorite time waster on the iOS but one things annoys me very much...Lemurs

I appreciate the challenge of trying to avoid them and outrun them but once you get past...say 10,000 meters they tend to start following you into the air. They will literally follow you into the air and that‚Äôs just ridiculous. I really don‚Äôt like trying to go for a record breaking run only to be knocked off my board a hundred feet off the ground by a glitched out floating lemur. Please fix this!!!

I love everything about this game. The graphics are simple but beautiful. The music is calming. I especially love how relaxing Zen mode is. The only thing that I don't understand is why Androids have Alto's Adventure and Alto's Odyssey as a free app and Apple users have to pay $5 for it. Lower the price, plz.

title.label: Lemurs can fly and it‚Äôs scary

content.label: Very spooky

I‚Äôd play this game for the rest of my life. You guys did a very good job on this game. I‚Äôve been playing this for about 2 years now and it‚Äôs just mind blowing. To others this game may seem ok to them but I find no problem with it because this is my opinion. 1 year ago I said to myself: ‚ÄúThis game is very boring. Who wants to play this.‚Äù Then I start deleting some apps and I come across this one. I almost deleted it. But then I started playing it again. And now I‚Äôm playing it more than ever. If you don‚Äôt have it, get it. If you do have it, play it. If you‚Äôre ever bored, this is the right game.

i have tried to switch from dunes to canyons to temples and it makes you pay 1,000 coins, which is fine idrk. but then it doesn‚Äôt switch to that? or it only is there for a few runs? this ain‚Äôt it. i‚Äôve been playing altos adventure for years when i was a kid, so i was super excited for another one when this came out. there are minor details that add to the ‚Äúaesthetic‚Äù of the game, and this is frustrating. please fix it or at least tell 
me how it is supposed to work!!!

I absolutely adored Odyssey and Adventure. The challenges get harder and harder, but once you accomplish them you‚Äôre so good at it by that point that looking back seems easy! The biggest disappointment for me was the ending to both games. There was no movie or moment of glory. Just ‚Äúyou‚Äôve completed all the goals!‚Äù After getting to know each character as you beat the levels, by the end I hoped to see them all together. After the many hours spent playing the game, I hoped for more at the end. If you aren‚Äôt as emotionally invested as I became during quarantine (lol) you should definitely download. It‚Äôs worth paying for!!

title.label: The game itself is great, but...

content.label: The game is now freezing and rendering itself unplayable. I purchased this game just yesterday, understand things happen, but it looks like this issue was mentioned 2 years prior to my current review. I‚Äôm on the original iPhone X.
It constantly freezes on a 10s max, and is unplayable. Going to get a refund on this. I loved altos adventure, so this is a big disappointment.

I love the game, I‚Äôve played both alto‚Äôs adventure and now odyssey. An idea I think you can add to the game is a similar mechanic to the lemurs but sometimes instead of having just lemurs why not have a npc similar to the elder in the previous game but instead it be in a race format where you have to beat the npc to a certain distance by doing tricks and as you get further in a run the races get harder and harder maybe even have them throwing obstacles at one point. Then once you beat the race you get a gift of say 1000 coins. You could have this as an unlockable feature day when you get all the characters or fully upgrade the wing suit.  

Another idea I have is to add wing suit only stunt courses, an example is Maeve you already start in the sky and you have to go to trough hoops to get more points/ speed. 

Another idea is to add more levels to explore maybe a cave setting or underground caverns 

I think you should consider adding things like this just because after you unlock all the characters and fully upgrade everything there isn‚Äôt much to do in the game.
You can do different tricks and the different characters are so different from each other, and it is unlike anything I have seen before!!!!!
I love Alto‚Äôs adventure and I just bought Alto‚Äôs odyssey today and the game freezes a lot I don‚Äôt know what that problem is but I will keep the stars how they are until the game gets fixed.

title.label: One mechanic ruins the entire thing.

content.label: Great relaxing game! However, the wall riding mechanics ruins the entire experience. It works sometimes because you have to hold down to back flip AND wall ride but can‚Äôt do both.

This game is beautiful and the graphics are amazing but the difference in music from the first one to the next one is kind of disappointing because the first had outstanding music but the music in the second was kind of a let. All in all great game will recommend.

This game is worth its price. Everything about it is absolutely beautiful. The graphics are stunning and dynamic, and the music is perfect, especially in zen mode. While some quests can be hard to achieve without being frustrated, just continuing to play the game without worrying too much about that difficult quest, will eventually result in the completion of the quest. Each character is unique, and poses a new challenge or strength, and collecting all of the characters feels rewarding. An amazing game overall.
